title: By Phone
notifyCustomerDialogDesc: Inform the customer that they will be asked to enter a PIN to confirm payment
customerAskedForPINDesc: The customer is asked to enter a PIN to confirm the payment. Refresh to see if the payment is complete.
amountNotFilledError: Make sure you fill in the amount you want to send
willEnablePayingThirdPartiesDesc: We will enable you to pay to LUKU, DSTV etc. via LipaLink soon.
unsupportedMOMOWalletError: Make sure your phone number is a TIGO or AIRTEL number

title: By Bank
desc: You can send money directly to your bank account either by visiting the bank, sending from other banks or through EcoBank agents.
